definitions.definition: Refusing to move or to change one's opinion ; obstinate ; firmly resisting ; persistent in doing something.
examples: He is pretty stubborn about his political beliefs, so why bother arguing?
Blood can make a very stubborn stain on fabrics if not washed properly.

definitions.definition: Of materials: physically stiff and inflexible; not easily melted or worked.

main_definition: Refusing to move or to change one's opinion ; obstinate ; firmly resisting ; persistent in doing something.
secondary_definitions: Of materials: physically stiff and inflexible; not easily melted or worked.
